Name: Chasing Monsters
Title: Pacific Warrior
Desc: Cyril is on a mission to catch a brutal and fearless predator capable of ramming sharks to death.
LongDescription: Waist deep in shark waters, Cyril is beaten by violent waves while casting his line from Christmas Island, Kiribati, where he is on a mission to catch a brutal and fearless predator capable of ramming sharks to death with its repetitive head-butts.
